website_summaries.verdict: Not an ideal choice for first-time tandem riders, but experienced cyclists will enjoy the 21-gear design and the wide tires for off-road trails and rougher terrain.
pros: Experienced riders should find it easy to assemble
Spring gel saddles very comfortable for longer rides
cons: 21-gear system may be too complicated for some riders
Original tires are not high quality, prone to flats

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride we love the bike
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to ride people are always looking at the bike ,for transportation I removed the front wheel and the back wheel and is ok for transporting in the vehicles,first I thought that not having individual pedaling was a bad idea but now is ok because we both my wife and I exercise at the same time,the price is really good I pay $268.00 for the bike and that is cheap for a nice ride,I'll include some pics
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: No returns and no replacement for damaged or missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived with a split in the rear tire, which I discovered after assembling it. It looks like a manufacturing defect. Unfortunately, once the bike is unpacked, there is no way to return it because you need to cut it loose from its shipping tie-downs and various other shipping materials. I called Amazon and there is no parts replacement service, so we are stuck with a useless piece of junk until I buy and install a new tire.
customer_reviews.author: George Lundskow

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves taking turns riding this bike. It is so much fun and incredibly easy to ride. It was very easy putting it together too. It is still working well and uses often 5 years later! Great quality and excellent bike!!!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyT24

customer_reviews.title: Great ride!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love riding this bike, my husband put it together with little issues. We didn't have bike grease, which is required so after we put it together we sent it off to our local bike shop for the final tune up and grease. Runs so smoothly. We originally had issues with our gears not switching correctly, but our bike shop got that corrected with some super fine tuning. I don't think we could have known how to fix the gear issue without them. Other than that great times!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Broken Parts damaged so bad, Useless
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to assemble the front wheel, I just found this(check the picture). The shape of front body is so broken, there is nothing I can do to assemble the front wheel. Now I’m so mad, after waiting for one week delivery, and I got this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bupeng Sun

customer_reviews.title: Nice First Tandem Bike
customer_reviews.text: I gambled on this bike and it paid off. My wife and I equal 380 lbs, I'm 6'2" and this bike handles us no problem. It's not that heavy and isn't a "brutal workout on hilly terrain", as one buyer suggested. Of course it has a huge turn radius; the bike is huge. Better for a park or on a track. Who would ride a tandem on a public road anyway? My wife and I are well pleased with this bike.
customer_reviews.author: H. A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been afraid to ride a bicycle. My partner wanted me to ride bicycles with him, but I never learned how. I have trouble with balance, so this is the reason I've been afraid to ride. We bought this tandem bike and we use it often with him doing the navigating so all I have to do is hold on the the hand rails and peddle. Great option for us and anyone who doesn't have the ability to ride a bike on their own.
customer_reviews.author: C Gerson

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike works well and rides smoothly with some adjustment. There is a consistent rattle from a center sprocket that keeps the long chain aligned. Also, when the product arrived, the front fork was bent where it connects to the tire axle--possibly from shipment. I had to pull out the tools to try and bend it back into the correct shape--which ruined the paint finish around the axle connector.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots Of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick, ~30 minutes. The UPS driver was ecstatic that I was watching for him to help unload. It isn't too heavy but the combination of it's weight and awkward large box would be a bit difficult alone. Put it on a 5 mile shakedown cruise without any issues. The coordination between riders wasn't as difficult as I had imagined. The box did have some damage but not as much as others have reported so I was thankful.
customer_reviews.author: PaPaMonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: For the price the bike was quite good. It came mostly assembled and the ride is smooth and comfortable. It is easy to control with a passenger in back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Trails
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a lot of fun, wife and I enjoy it , once all the settings get set. ( Seat, handle bars ) We have nothing bad to say about this bike for the money
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Delivery Time and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item back in May, it is now coming up on Sep 1st. I have inquired about delivery of this product over two months ago to get a status that it was submitted for delivery to Fedex back in Jun with an estimated delivery date of 15 July. There has been no change in delivery status, still stuck in CA for the same status as of 2 months ago. By far the worst experience I have had ordering on Amazon and with their delivery service
customer_reviews.author: Tu McLendon

customer_reviews.title: Bought this bike for 200 bucks
customer_reviews.text: What a steal for 200. I ride this bike 3-4 times a week. Great way to get outside and enjoy biking with a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dodecahedron

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. It’s not easy to assemble. No quick release parts. Recommend riding with the hex wrenches. Not everything is included, so having some extra Allen wrenches around is a good idea. It’s very heavy and not trivial to balance, but it gets the job done. We are able to bike as a family now, so it really met our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H. Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! We have had so much fun with it. Suggestion: We found nothing in the instructions indicating the function of a small black piece. It took awhile to figure out it's a guard for the rear derailleur. This should be clearly stated in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brakes could be a little better. Just like a regular bike
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quick, and was well packaged. No problems with scratches or dents and dings. Front wheel was the only problem, with it being mis aligned. Had to adjust the spokes, and before long, was up and cruising. No problems as of yet. Brakes could be a little better. Just like a regular bike, but needs upgraded for the extra weight of 2 people. Over all, bike is built good.
customer_reviews.author: L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this bike is fine. Not the top-of-the-line quality and the seat in the back arrived with two cuts in it. Also one of the emblems was scratched up. It might need to be packed better.
customer_reviews.author: christine b

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to ride
customer_reviews.text: beautiful bike my husband is putting it together right now !!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn D

customer_reviews.title: Finally Showed Up
customer_reviews.text: The COVID bike delay is real. This finally showed up. Had to watch a few bike tuning videos to set up gears and brakes, Overall, good quality for the price. Wife and I had ridden a few times. Still can't adjust gears to not click (could be me). If you want casual rides (not break-neck racing), I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Not in stock - false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by this product showing up as in stock. They don't have it in stock and do not fulfill orders, however, they don't let you know right away and, in fact, give you a ship date but that date comes and goes. Then you have to reach out and they will apologize and say they don't have the item. DON"T FALL FOR IT!
customer_reviews.author: Upset Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I little sloppy on the finish
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I little sloppy on the finish, but it carries my 300+ pound back side down the road without missing a beat. Assembled in less than one hour (all metric tools needed) without reading the directions (who needs direction anyway?!?!). some minor adjusting during break in period. Surprised at the value, we are very pleased!!!!! Shipping was delayed but the seller responded immediately when I contacted them and answered my questions satisfactorily. We give this bike a tandem thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble and easier to ride. Such a blast
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for his 60th birthday, he was over the top surprised and happy. We put it together and took off. We are having so much fun and the looks we get from people is great cause I think they are thinking they should get one. We Love it
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Neel

customer_reviews.title: Seems very good, but manual received would work for a regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. Seems very good, but manual received would work for a regular bike, since there is no manual for the Tandem included. Missing screws for both water bottle holders so there is no way to install them. There is one metallic part that we do not know how/where to install since there is no manual, knowledge about regular bikes does not help, thus I hope manufacturer or seller provides them.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bike
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bike during the COVID-19 pandemic. It is a great way for my son and I to ride around and get some exercise. It was not too hard to put together, a few adjustments needed. It takes a little time to get in synch but lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Great transporation when the RV is parked were ever we stayed
customer_reviews.text: Bought some different seats since both of us felt the seats were uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Tandem bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Bike is very nice styling but had a problem with forward derailer left-hand side of handlebar broke immediately bike was returned replacement bike also broke immediately. Bike was still worth keeping and replace the defective forward gear selector again still happy with the bicycle, and glad I repaired the problem
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Me and my wife loved the ride but problem happened the day after the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike on July. I assembled the bike( it wasn't that hard). I didn't have time to ride it until September. Me and my wife loved the ride but problem happened the day after the ride. Tire got flat. There is no apparent damages that I can see on tire, I think it is inner that is leaking. I inflated the tire when I found it's flat but It wouldn't stay inflated. There is no information available for the size of replacement inner tube Even manufacturer's website I can't find the information.....
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: ordered for a friend and she loves it!! ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered for a friend and she loves it!!! She took it to a bike shop to have them put it together so it would be done correct, cost her about $100.00 she said was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Gonna be fun!
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and it was mostly assembled, took me 30 minutes to finish assembly and we were riding around the neighborhood. Has only taken it for a short ride so far but for the price you cannot go wrong. We are going to have a lot of fun with this bike just cruising around, it no speedy road bike and I recommend skipping the instructions, if you have any mechanical skills it shouldn't take more than an hour to be from the box to the road.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bowersock

customer_reviews.title: Good bike!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and a good buy for the price. I only wish that both pedal cranks didn't have to move simultaneously. A more expensive bike probably has the costing feature for the individual cranks.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Richard

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The bike came in scratched. Also missing: pedals, water bottle holder, the stem that attached the back handlebar to the front seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad bike
customer_reviews.text: The front wheel doesn't last long. It blew on the first minute and after an exchange the same thing happened after a 15 minute ride. I weigh 112lbs and my daughter 50 lbs. You can't even order a new wheel from the company or Amazon. It is not a high quality bike at all.
customer_reviews.author: hanieh

customer_reviews.title: fun ride
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bike I"d take on the road but it works fine around town. Takes a bit of adjustment from a normal bike but it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. My husband is using it a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. My husband is using it a lot with our 14 year old child with autism. Our son is able to pedal on the back and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kelly simpkiss

customer_reviews.title: The bike came good it just that I could tell someone put the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike came good it just that I could tell someone put the bike together before because the was stripped screws and some deep scratches on handle bars where they used a hammer to fix it but over all it's a good fun bike
customer_reviews.author: James cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Good price but replace the seats
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the heck out of our bike when we use it. We had to replace the seats because they were not as comfortable as we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: College Jane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Presently have about 1200 miles on the bike
customer_reviews.text: Had my bike almost six months. Awesome. Presently have about 1200 miles on the bike. Has performed very well. Did have to change tires for our rigorous riding. Smooth riding on rough surfaces and easy handling. I would recommend this bike to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: James Joines

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: We love this bike - it turns a lot of heads and looks sharp. It works great and is a lot of fun. We are definitely happy with our purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Oly Eco Girl

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying our new tandem bike
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike we put our individual bikes in our rv and we ride the tandem bike almost every night now
customer_reviews.author: Guy england

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: My children are riding it all over. It takes a little getting used to as far as getting on and getting started.
customer_reviews.author: James Barrett

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: The tandem bike arrived on time. It was easy to assemble. When I tried to ride it the first time, the chain broke. Now it's being repaired st the bike shop. Not my idea of quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: A whole lot of fun for under $300. Instructions not the best but still went together pretty easy. Riding it was a bit tricky at first but we all caught on pretty fast. Wish the seats had a quick adjust but hasn't proved to be a big problem. Looking forward To the rest of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F

customer_reviews.title: Really fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to ride. I ride with my boyfriend, or my kids and we have a blast cruising the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: This bike can also create problem with your love ones
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, wife loving it until it's time to ride lol... wish it had came/made with suspension other than that, it's great loving it.
customer_reviews.author: RANelSr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the bike. Nice for the price. Looking forward to spending more time on the bike. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MD New York

customer_reviews.title: the front wheel is too close to pedal,
customer_reviews.text: the front wheel is too close to pedal, when u ride on it the front person need to be careful
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Yie

customer_reviews.title: Thus bike Is so much fun, my wife and I pull our kids behind ...
customer_reviews.text: Thus bike Is so much fun, my wife and I pull our kids behind it in a kid trailer and go all over the town.
customer_reviews.author: Josh&Amber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike. Everybody stares and smiles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike. Everybody stares and smiles. Moves easily and quickly with two people. The gears didn't all work straight out of the box--had to tweak them quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Harris

customer_reviews.title: I like it. A little stiff
customer_reviews.text: I like it. A little stiff. But, it's great to take my granddaughter riding with, but definitely like my single ride better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Heitman

customer_reviews.title: Fun! For me and my wife!
customer_reviews.text: After so many great beach vacations renting tandems—I thought to surprise a “hard to birthday shop for” wife a Reminder of so many great times that we can now have in our own town! Went over well—she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike, rides smooth
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike , rides smooth, easy to assemble. Nice to go for a bike ride and talk without screaming. Fun !
customer_reviews.author: Noah's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the money. It's heavy and large to store so you need a dedicated spot in your garage or shed. Assembly was easy. The rear handle bars are too short if the rear cyclist is over 5'9" or so or has long legs.
customer_reviews.author: C Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great tandem starter bike!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are 5'10" and 5'9" 200 and 210 lb. we bought replacement comfort seats and the back seat rider needed taller handlebars. Very happy after we got the missing parts. Not everyone will like tandem riding, this is a perfect bike to try it out. Original review: I must give one star but it deserves zero. There were parts missing; seat post / stem combo (part to attach the rear handle bar to the front seat post) and dual water bottle holders were missing.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvDoxies

customer_reviews.title: Love and Marriage!
customer_reviews.text: Great Value for a tandem. It is great marriage therapy! You learn to communicate and work in unison!!!
customer_reviews.author: DWW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, economical, heavy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I am no bicycle expert by any means. My last full-size bicycle was a green Schwinn Varsity 10-speed back in the mid 70's. That being said, I am thrilled by this Kent tandem, economical (low $300s in 2015) it's very sturdy (at 60+ lbs it should be), have quality parts, and is ready to go 15 minutes out of the box. It's great for neighborhood jaunts with my sweetie. Everyone wants to take a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Rei Shinozuka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Family Outings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tandem after a few months of researching available options, both from online retailers and local stores. Took a chance with this bike, a decision based heavily on the good reviews, and 8 months later, a ride around town on this bike is still one of the first things our family wants to do in the evenings. We have a young toddler who sits on the front with a mounted bike seat (Peg Perego - perfect fit) and the three of us ride comfortably for 30-60 minute rides. Can't speak for anyone who lives in hilly areas, as we enjoy mostly flat routes, but we give it a thumbs-up and a definite recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: bftlady23

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red colored bike. The pedals were extremely hard to put on. Once I finished assembling the bike, my wife and I took it for a ride and the front tire rubs the front pedals when turning. Can you say SAFETY HAZARD. Also the breaks would still rub against on one side no matter how many times it was adjusted. I'm returning it as soon as I disassemble it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The bike is perfect for what it is worth! The wife and I enjoy cruising around together. We also pull a trailer behind us and it is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colton elliott

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike, it was easy to assemble. Now my wife and I go on many biking trips together we have a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult putting together, as the English directions ...
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult putting together, as the English directions appear to have been translated from Chinese by someone from China! But has done well since that time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I rounded the rating up because we totally love the bike
customer_reviews.text: I would rate 4.5 if I could only because the bike was received with minor scratches which could have happened during shipping (there was a hole torn in the side of the box near the scratches). I rounded the rating up because we totally love the bike. Shipped very fast, easy to assemble, works fine, looks great: we like the color and style and it's very sporty for a tandem. I would highly recommend this bike to anyone who is considering expanding their activity schedule to include 2-seater cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for a friend and she LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend and she LOVED it!! Highly recommend this if you're looking for a tandem bike. It's a good looking, solid bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father... He a pretty big guy and weighs about 275 and this bike holds up well with 2 people. We love the bright color. The price was great. Didn't have any issues when we got it. Rides smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with bent fork and broken reflector, otherwise seems nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a bent fork and broken reflector. Haven't used it yet but seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: mary hinkofer

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: We use the bike all the time! It is perfect for us and the neighborhood kids LOVE it too!
customer_reviews.author: khimmba

customer_reviews.title: Giving 3 stars because it was missing the bracket for ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving 3 stars because it was missing the bracket for the handlebar and we have to find a replacement. Was a bummer, because we didn't have the part and were not able to ride when we had a small trip planned to ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E.

customer_reviews.title: Close but no Cigar!
customer_reviews.text: Item is satisfactory EXCEPT for missing rear handlebar stem which of course leaves the rear rider without any hand hold points. Would be acceptable IF I could contact Warehouse Deals, Inc, (which is an Amazon Prime, subsidiary). Otherwise I will be required to return a perfectly fine bicycle, Please provide assistance as shipping box is not reusable!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Van Fraysier

product_meta.title: Northwoods Dual Drive Tandem Bike, 26-Inch, Green/Black
product_meta.description: Enjoy a bicycle built for two without breaking the bank with the Kent Dual Drive tandem beach cruiser. The durable, high-quality bike is comfortable and stylish, with a pair of soft gel saddles and extra-wide, bump-gobbling 2.1-inch tires. The components, meanwhile, are built for long-lasting use, including the 21-speed Shimano drive train, Revo twist shifters and reliable alloy linear pull V brakes. Best of all, the frame features low stand-over heights (29 Inch in the front and 20 Inch in back), making it easy for both riders to hop on. Also equipped with a pair of water bottle holders and a heavy-duty kickstand, the tandem bike is perfect for people who want to spend a little quality time with a spouse or good friend.
feature_bullets: High-quality tandem bike with a durable cruiser-style frame
21-speed Shimano Tourney drive train and Revo twist shifters
Easy-to-access stand-over heights (29 Inch front and 20 Inch rear)
Extra-wide 2.1-inch tires; reliable alloy linear pull V brakes
Pair of spring gel saddles and dual water bottle holders
